DOC.brief_summary: A study to determine whether treatment with Pulmicort in children has any effect on the varicella vaccine
DOC.criteria: Children between the age of 10 months and 8 years, have asthma or shown recent signs suggesting asthma, have a parent or guardian willing to comply with study requirements Varicella zoster immune globulin (VZIG) within 5 months prior to immunization, Previous varicella immunization, an immunization or allergy immunotherapy 4 weeks prior to immunization, Severe asthma, have another persistent lung disease, have a planned hospitalization for the duration of study
